about_the_game:
- 'Spell of Infinity' is a 3D MOBA game set in a world of swords and magic.

You can team up with other players and fight in 4:4 battles or compete in boss mob raids.

Also, most of the content is open so you can enjoy the game without any separate purchases, so there is no burden!

Join the online battlefield right now!

- Strategically select 16 heroes to subdue your enemies!

(Tank type STR, damage dealer CON, supporter and special magician WIS, ADP who is good at fast growth and non-magical skills)

※ New features, pets, skins, DLC, and heroes will be added regularly!

Tens of thousands of years after the creation of the world, the gods fell into eternal sleep, and human greed led them to forbidden magic.

The Kingdom of Cory made some kind of deal with 'Darkside' to invade the neighboring Principality of Kudarin and the entire continent beyond,

and the 'Eternal Crystal', the source of life and magic power, is gradually losing its power.

To determine the future of the world, which is like a light in the wind,

the time of the decisive battle between new heroes - those who want to protect and those who want to take over - is imminent.

- Free to Play: Get multiple free hero acquisition coupons when you sign up and achieve major achievements

- Crystal System: Summon magic crystals anywhere on the map, easily trade with merchants, and manage your inventory. When upgrading the crystal, cast buffs/debuffs and active skills as a supporter of your allies.

- Raid Boss Mode: Become a dragon slayer and gain additional Rank Points.

- The 'Talisman' item blocks the opponent's CC or debuff skills several times. Also, if you throw the 'Void Orb' at the opponent, the buffs will be removed. Use it at the right time.

- The basic pets are powerful, but there are also more special pets available.

- Accumulate victory points to increase your rank and raise your country's flag high on the leaderboard.

- Eliminate special mobs to earn advanced items or team rewards.
